hackathon-description-text: Hello World is a 24-hour hackathon made specifically for first-time hackers! This hackathon gives students the opportunity to create amazing projects with the help of mentors and company workshops. After 24 hours, students have the opportunity to present their projects in the Expo and win cool prizes!
hackathon-eligibility: Hello World is open to freshmen and first-time hackers.
hackathon-requirements:
Submit your project on here! Make sure it is the project you worked on during Hello World not before! Also please remember to list all the members of your team so we know who contributed.
The final deadline for submissions is 12:00 PM, September 16th. After that, you will not be able to submit your projects and be eligible for prizes.
hackathon-rules: Have fun, learn something new, and don't do anything stupid!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Echo Dot for each member on the team
Chromecast for each member of the team
Apple gift card for each member of the team
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best iOS App Presented by iOS Dev Club

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: JBL Speaker for each member of the team

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Memorial Mall, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We're looking for people who went outside their comfort zone and developed a challenging project.
We're looking for creative ideas and innovative projects that make you think outside the box and that offers a new perspective.
We want to see how much you've challenged yourself and what technologies and programming tools you've used.

hackathon-location-address: Memorial Mall, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA
